dublin_core.dcvalue: With the popularized use cell phones more and more concern has been aroused over the effects of their radiation on human health particularly on male reproduction Cell phone radiation may cause structural and functional injuries of the testis alteration of semen parameters reduction of epididymal sperm concentration and decline of male fertility This article presents an overview on the impact of cell phone radiation on male reproduction
Zhonghua nan ke xue = National journal of andrology
[Impact of cell phone radiation on male reproduction].
